attributes.action: Order a recall of renault clio's affected by the faulty bonnet catch.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as highlighted in the watchdog program renault and vosa are refusing to admit that some renault clio's have a bonnet catch safety problem. this a very serious matter and it is a matter of time before somebody is killed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
